name: Escape from Mars (mohammad.dhm, nimadavoudi, Amin, SH_SWAT, arashsg)
name_original: Escape from Mars (mohammad.dhm, nimadavoudi, Amin, SH_SWAT, arashsg)
description:
Three lost robots trying to escape from lifeless deserts on Mars.

Designed by me
Artist: arashsg (Arash Saghi)
Programmers: Amin89 (Amin Moazzen), SH_SWAT (Shahin Keshavarz)
Music and SFX:  nimadavoudi (Nima Davoudi)

Project source: https://github.com/AminMoazzen/Escape-from-Mars
